name: EAST TORRESDALE CIVIC ASSOCIATION v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and Appeal of James FLANNERY
name_abbreviation: East Torresdale Civic Ass'n v. Zoning Board of Adjustment

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: EAST TORRESDALE CIVIC ASSOCIATION v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and Appeal of James FLANNERY.

casebody.head_matter:
499 A.2d 1064
EAST TORRESDALE CIVIC ASSOCIATION v. ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF the CITY OF PHILADELPHIA and Appeal of James FLANNERY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1985.
Decided Nov. 7, 1985.

Richelle D. Hittinger, Philadelphia, for East Torresdale Civic Assoc., Barbara W. Mather, City Sol., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
